roleset.name: create

example.name: args0-3
example.text: An NC State student created a "monster" out of construction barrels for his estranged girlfriend.

example.name: with arg4
example.text: [Arthur Eisenmenger]-1, a former chief graphic designer for the EEC, claims *PRO*-1 to have created it as a generic symbol of Europe.
example.arg: as a generic symbol of Europe.

roleset.note: Member of VNcls create-26.4, engender-27. Updated by Julia.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'create' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with other verbs-of-creation (develop, make, produce, turn, work). For additional examples of the higher-numbered arguments consult the frames files for those verbs.
